subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: In his first race this year, the Olympic star Usain Bolt won the 400 meters in 46.35 seconds Saturday at the Jamaica Camperdown Classic in Kingston. Bolt slowed in the last 50 meters, smiling while looking right and left in winning for the second straight year. Bolt set world records at the Beijing Games in the 100 (9.69) and the 200 (19.30).
